@graph.caption: Vegan Spinach Dip Breadsticks. Creamy Corn and Spinach dip spread over pizza crust or puff pastry, bake, slice and serve. Easy Vegan Recipe. Can be gluten-free if served as a dip #vegan #veganricha #recipe #spinachdip | VeganRicha.com

@graph.name: Vegan Spinach Dip Breadsticks - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Vegan Spinach Dip Breadsticks. Creamy Corn & Spinach dip spread over pizza crust or puff pastry, bake, slice, serve. Easy Vegan Recipe. Can be gluten-free if served as a dip.

@graph.name: Vegan Spinach Dip Breadsticks
@graph.description: Vegan Spinach Dip Breadsticks. Creamy Corn and Spinach dip spread over pizza crust or puff pastry, bake, slice and serve. Easy Vegan Recipe. Can be gluten-free if served as a dip.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/3 cup non dairy milk or water
1 tbsp flour or  use rice flour to make it gluten-free
1 tsp apple cider vinegar or white vinegar
1 tsp miso or 1 tbsp nutritional yeast for cheesier flavor
1 tbsp fresh dill or 1 tsp dried
1 tbsp chives or parsley or both or 1/2 tsp dried parsley
1  Recipe Easy Pizza crust  (or 2 puff pastry sheets.)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add spinach, corn and pepper flakes and mix in. Cook for 4 to 6 minutes. (I use frozen spinach directly from the freezer, fresh will cook faster).
recipeInstructions.name: Add spinach, corn and pepper flakes and mix in. Cook for 4 to 6 minutes. (I use frozen spinach directly from the freezer, fresh will cook faster).

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend cashews with all the ingredients from non dairy milk to black pepper. Blend until smooth. (For thick and creamier dip, use 1/2 cup cashews and 1 tsp starch)
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend cashews with all the ingredients from non dairy milk to black pepper. Blend until smooth. (For thick and creamier dip, use 1/2 cup cashews and 1 tsp starch)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mixture to the skillet. Sprinkle in the dill, chives/parsley and black pepper and mix in. Bring to a boil to thicken. Taste and adjust flavor. Cook for another minute stirring continuously then take off heat. At this point this dip can be served as is. Or transfer to a bread bowl and serve warm-hot with a sprinkle of vegan parm on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mixture to the skillet. Sprinkle in the dill, chives/parsley and black pepper and mix in. Bring to a boil to thicken. Taste and adjust flavor. Cook for another minute stirring continuously then take off heat. At this point this dip can be served as is. Or transfer to a bread bowl and serve warm-hot with a sprinkle of vegan parm on top.

recipeInstructions.text: To make breadsticks, Prep your pizza crust and roll it out into somewhat rectangle or use thawed puff pastry sheets.  Spread the warm/cool (not hot) dip over the crust. Add jalapeno or other sliced veggies or veggie sausage or other toppings.
recipeInstructions.name: To make breadsticks, Prep your pizza crust and roll it out into somewhat rectangle or use thawed puff pastry sheets.  Spread the warm/cool (not hot) dip over the crust. Add jalapeno or other sliced veggies or veggie sausage or other toppings.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 425 degress F(220 deg C) for 17 minutes. Remove from the oven and let it sit for half a minute. Slice into breadsticks and serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 425 degress F(220 deg C) for 17 minutes. Remove from the oven and let it sit for half a minute. Slice into breadsticks and serve!
